hi! this deck is about

wags.fm

so that's wags.fm!

we're building the world's first programmable radio station, where all of the music is editable in real time.

wags is all about collaboration

the editor below can host up to 100 musicians collaborating on the same work. open the link https://yap.wags.fm/p/deck from your phone and see for yourself!

all-in on the creator economy

wags.fm will power hxaro, an online platform where musicians and coders pair up to create interactive musical experiences in the browser. Each time a sample is played or an effect is used, we make it the object of a small transaction. agents across the musical supply chain get paid fairly and immediately.

we're building a team

we're looking for passionate music-industry experts that believe in the the project's vision to create a collaborative realtime streaming service as powerful as the world's leading DAWs. join us as we get it into the hands of millions of creators and billions of listeners.
